description: Claude Desktop configuration for remote Kimai MCP server with per-client authentication
notes: - Replace 'your-server-address' with your actual server IP or domain
- Replace 'your-mcp-server-token-here' with the MCP server token from logs
- Replace 'your-personal-kimai-api-token' with YOUR Kimai API token
- Each user uses their OWN Kimai API token (not shared!)
- Get your token from your Kimai user profile > API section
- X-Kimai-URL: Override default Kimai server URL (if needed)
- X-Kimai-User: Default user ID for operations
- Your Kimai token is sent securely to the server
- Server creates isolated session with YOUR permissions
- All actions are auditable under your Kimai user account
- No shared credentials = better security and compliance
